transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha ji Suraj ji baat kar rahe hain lifestyle se
Customer: ha ji bataiye ha ji ha ji bataiye
Executive: sir main Shubham baat kar raha hun India mart office se Varasir
Customer: ha okay hi Shubham kaise hain aap ji aap kaise hain sir
Executive: all good bataiye ji actually sir aapse abhi na ranjit ka discussion hoga I think video meeting mein right
Customer: ha ji ha ji
Executive: ji to uska feedback sir ek employee feedback aapke pass jata hai sir to I think aapne not satisfied kiya hai
Customer: yes
Executive: ji to sir basically services ke liye hai ya iske liye thoda sa wo samajhna chah raha tha main
Customer: ha ji
Executive: to bhai update main karunga kya ja ke update kar ji sir to matlab basically main ye samajhna chah raha tha ki sir shayad wo main samajh gaya ki aapka bhi discussion mere pass bhi feedback aaya tha ki aap jo hai wo services ke related issue face kar rahe the jo export ke leads hai right sir
Customer: for sure ha
Executive: right and sir uske liye basically aapne do teen din ka time bhi main last request kiya tha kyunki main na ek bar team ko jo hamari internal team hai use escalation dal rahe hain hum log ranjit aur yes meri mahendra ji se baat hui maine same issue unhe bhi bataya dekhiye aapko aapko team ke sath baith ke meeting karni padegi jo sales ki team hai jo leads lati hai because market mein bahut demand hai aap aisa nahi bol sakte hain ki demand nahi hai like I don't know India mart ke pass kyun nahi hai
Executive: main ek bar escalation dal de rahe hain hum log jo technical team hai jahan se hamara lead generation hota hai us team ko hum dal dete hain ek bar waha se hame do teen din ke andar conclusion aa jayega jo bhi hoga hum aapko ek bar clear kar denge theek hai sir
Customer: baki Suraj ji one month one month ho chuka hai sir I am not getting anything like zero from my side
Executive: yes sir aapki services jo live hui hai wo I think 16th of october ko hui hai
Customer: almost one month ho gaya hai right almost one month hone wala hai ji bilkul main ek bar dekh leta hun aap two to three days ka time hame allow kariye sir dusra kya hai Suraj ji aapne na jo not satisfied mark kiya hai actually wo feedback jo hai wo employee ke liye hota hai sir wo jo ranjit kumar singh aapse meeting me tha wo uske liye feedback tha
Customer: okay
Executive: to aapki services ka jo feedback mujhe personal unse koi problem nahi hai but to be honest I am paying to the India mart so I have a problem with India mart only
Executive: sir I can understand and I already escalated your matter to my technical team let me get the conclusion through my technical team definitely I will get back to you after two to three days but at least aap mere ko is ye jo aapne employee ke liye feedback diya hai wo basically main aapka jo concern mere pass open hua hai main close kar de raha hun
Customer: um ya maybe today or tomorrow it will be aap mere ko aap mere ko sir aap mere ko parso tak ka time de dijiye aaj 10th hai aap mere ko 12th tak ka time de dijiye
Executive: this one is new it's so and some new colors in paint also
Customer: hello
Executive: yes ha main actually customer se ha bataiye
Executive: sir aap mere ko 12th tak ka time de dijiye
Customer: acha theek hai na sir main 12th tak is pe aapko definitely matlab jo bhi mere pass resolution aayega wo aapko okay sir agar nahi hua kuch nahi ho paya then I want to know
Executive: sir intention aisi nahi hai ki kuch na ho paye intention yahi rahegi ki ise resolve karane ki aap do din ka time to dijiye
Customer: sir aapko pata hai dekhiye problem ek hi hoti hai man lijiye leads nahi aa rahe hain I don't have any issue until mera time wala nahi hota India mart pe you know like isme sara game time ka hai
Executive: samajh gaya sir main aap mere ko ek bar please time allow kariye do din ka time allow kar dijiye aap mere ko 12th tak ka okay main aapko is pe get back karta hun second main aapka jo concern mere pass open hai wo main close kar de raha hun sir because that that was that that feedback for the employee actually wo employee ke liye feedback hota hai sir matlab employee se koi problem hai to aap bataiye sir mere ko
Customer: nahi problem mere ko maine aapko share kar diya hai like it's all about India mart uske liye aap please mere ko do din ka time allow kariye already main uske liye concern open kar chuka hun sir main ye concern aapka close kar de raha hun aapke pass feedback ke liye mail aayega wo hamare liye aata hai sir wo please aap satisfied kar dijiyega
Customer: okay but make sure mera ho jaye isme
Executive: sir do din ka time do din mein samne se main call karunga aapko iske liye bolne ki zarurat nahi padegi main khud reminder dal de raha hun aapke pass ek feedback mail aayega sir abhi wo hamare liye aayega that was that will be for ranjit or for me to please aap use satisfied mark kar dijiyega theek hai
Customer: theek hai theek hai okay thank you so much sir
Executive: theek hai Suraj ji okay thank you so much sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting expected leads from IndiaMART.

- Dissatisfied with the services.

- The customer has issues with IndiaMART only.



Resolution:

- Executive escalated the issue to the technical team.

- Executive assured a resolution within 2-3 days.

- Executive closed the concern from their end.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer in 2 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, resolution, feedback
